original_text: As a result, we are proud to tell believers in other churches about you. We tell them how you continue to trust God in your many troubles. You are patient and brave, even when people cause you to have much pain.
korean_text: 그러므로 너희가 견디고 있는 모든 박해와 환난 중에서 너희 인내와 믿음으로 말미암아 하나님의 여러 교회에서 우리가 친히 자랑하노라

sentences.original_text: As a result, we are proud
to tell believers in other churches about you
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 교회의 신자들에게 당신에 대해 말하기를

sentences.original_text: We tell them how you continue to trust God
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그들에게 당신이 계속 하나님을 신뢰한다고 말합니다

sentences.original_text: even when people cause you to have much pain
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 당신에게 큰 고통을 줄 때에도
